description: From Middle English feendly, fendly (“hostile, devilish”), from Old English fēondliċ (“hostile”), corresponding to fiend +‎ -ly. Cognate with Dutch vijandelijk (“hostile”), German feindlich (“hostile”), Danish fjendtlig (“hostile”), Swedish fiendtlig, fientlig (“hostile”).

adjectives.description: fiendly (comparative more fiendly, superlative most fiendly)
